setlang.unavailable_language: The selected language is incorrect or not supported.
setlang.success_change: All set! From now on, I will communicate with you in this language.
setlang.default_message_options:
Hello, how are you? You can choose from 5 different languages for me to know how to communicate with you.
You can choose from **"Portuguese (`pt-BR`), English (`en-US`), Japanese (`ja`), French (`fr`), and Spanish (`es-ES`)**.
setlang.language_not_found: The source language was not found.
setlang.fail_change: Unfortunately, it was not possible to edit your language, you can try again in a few seconds?
setlang.iquals_languages: Hey! Your language and what you requested are the same, did you know?

invite_message_embeds.description: You can add me [by clicking here]({{link}})
